My Creative Process

All of My UI/UX and design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result I am looking for

Discuss The Project

I usually discuss what goals the new website needs to fulfill with friends and mentors.

Brainstorming ^ concept

With the scope well-defined, I start digging into the sitemap, defining how the content we defined in scope definition will interrelate.

UI/UX Planning

I start creating content for the individual pages, always keeping search engine optimization(SEO) in mind.

Testing

By combining manual browsing of the site on a variety of devices with automated site crawlers, I identify everything from user experience issues to simple broken links.
